channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Skype for Business Server 2015
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Skype for Business Server 2015

item.title: CVE-2019-0798|2024-08-04T17:58:59.156Z -- microsoft -- skype%20for%20business%20server%202015
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists when a Lync Server or Skype for Business Server does not properly sanitize a specially crafted request, aka 'Skype for Business and Lync Spoofing Vulnerability'.
